#include "../deptran/__dep__.h"
#include "server.h"
#include "../deptran/raft/server.h"
#include "client.h"

namespace janus {



int64_t ShardKvServer::GetNextOpId() {
  verify(sp_log_svr_);
  int64_t ret = sp_log_svr_->site_id_;
  ret = ret << 32;
  ret = ret + op_id_cnt_++; 
  return ret;
}

bool ShardKvServer::KVOperation(string oid){
  RaftServer& raftServer = this->GetRaftServer();
  lock_guard<recursive_mutex> lock(raftServer.mtx_);
  Timer waitTimer;
  waitTimer.start();
  while(waitTimer.elapsed()*1e6 < this->agreementTimeOut && this->completedCmds.count(oid)==0){
    // Log_info("Time Elapsed: %f", waitTimer.elapsed());
    Coroutine::Sleep(this->agreementTimeOut/10);
  }
  // waitTimer.reset();
  return (this->completedCmds.count(oid));
}

int ShardKvServer::Put(const uint64_t& oid, 
                  const string& k,
                  const string& v) {
  Log_info("Put ShardKvServer");
  RaftServer& raftServer = this->GetRaftServer();
  lock_guard<recursive_mutex> lock(raftServer.mtx_);
  string oid_string  = to_string(oid);
  auto s = make_shared<MultiStringMarshallable>();
  s->data_.push_back(to_string(oid));
  s->data_.push_back("put");
  s->data_.push_back(k);
  s->data_.push_back(v);
  shared_ptr<Marshallable> cmd = s;
  uint64_t index, term;
  bool result = raftServer.Start(cmd, &index, &term);
  if(!result){
    Log_info("Put Not Leader %d", oid);
    return KV_NOTLEADER;
  }
  bool ret  = KVOperation(oid_string);
  if(ret){
    Log_info("Put Success %d", oid);
    return KV_SUCCESS;
  }
  Log_info("Get Timeout %d", oid);
  return KV_TIMEOUT;
}

int ShardKvServer::Append(const uint64_t& oid, 
                     const string& k,
                     const string& v) {
    // lab_shard: fill in your code
  Log_info("Append ShardKvServer");
  RaftServer& raftServer = this->GetRaftServer();
  lock_guard<recursive_mutex> lock(raftServer.mtx_);
  string oid_string  = to_string(oid);
  auto s = make_shared<MultiStringMarshallable>();
  s->data_.push_back(to_string(oid));
  s->data_.push_back("append");
  s->data_.push_back(k);
  s->data_.push_back(v);
  shared_ptr<Marshallable> cmd = s;
  uint64_t index, term;
  bool result = raftServer.Start(cmd, &index, &term);
  if(!result){
    Log_info("Append Not Leader %d", oid);
    return KV_NOTLEADER;
  }
  bool ret  = KVOperation(oid_string);
  if(ret){
    Log_info("Append Success %d", oid);
    return KV_SUCCESS;
  }
  Log_info("Append Timeout %d", oid);
  return KV_TIMEOUT;
}

int ShardKvServer::Get(const uint64_t& oid, 
                  const string& k,
                  string* v) {
    // lab_shard: fill in your code
  Log_info("Get ShardKvServer");
  Log_info("Get ShardKvServer key: %s", k.c_str());
  RaftServer& raftServer = this->GetRaftServer();
  lock_guard<recursive_mutex> lock(raftServer.mtx_);
  string oid_string  = to_string(oid);


  auto s = make_shared<MultiStringMarshallable>();
  s->data_.push_back(to_string(oid));
  s->data_.push_back("get");
  s->data_.push_back(k);
  // s->data_.push_back(*v);
  shared_ptr<Marshallable> cmd = s;
  uint64_t index, term;
  bool result = raftServer.Start(cmd, &index, &term);
  if(!result){
    Log_info("Get Not Leader %d", oid);
    return KV_NOTLEADER;
  }
  Log_info("Get ShardKV for Leader %d", raftServer.site_id_);
  bool ret  = KVOperation(oid_string);
  if(ret){
    Log_info("Get Success %d", oid);
    if(completedCmds.count(oid_string)){
      *v = kvStore[k];
      return KV_SUCCESS;
    }
  }
  Log_info("Get Timeout %d", oid);
  return KV_TIMEOUT;
}

void ShardKvServer::OnNextCommand(Marshallable& m) {
    // lab_shard: fill in your code
  RaftServer& raftServer = this->GetRaftServer();
  lock_guard<recursive_mutex> lock(raftServer.mtx_);
  auto v = (MultiStringMarshallable*)(&m);
  string oid = (v->data_[0]);
  string op = v->data_[1];
  string key = v->data_[2];
  completedCmds.insert(oid);
  if(op == "get"){
    Log_info("Get - Key %s, Val %s", key.c_str(), kvStore[key].c_str());
  }


  else if(op == "put"){
    string newVal = v->data_[3];
    kvStore[key] = newVal;
    Log_info("Put - Key %s, Val %s", key.c_str(), kvStore[key].c_str());
  }
  else if(op == "append"){
    string newVal = v->data_[3];
    if(kvStore.count(key)){
      try{
        string orignal = kvStore[key];
        kvStore[key]= orignal + newVal;
      }
      catch(...){
        Log_info("Nikunj Mittal catches error!!!");
      }
    }
    else{
      kvStore[key]=newVal;
    }
    Log_info("Put - Key %s, Val %s, appendVal: %s", key.c_str(), kvStore[key].c_str(), newVal.c_str());
  }
}

shared_ptr<ShardKvClient> ShardKvServer::CreateClient(Communicator* comm) {
  auto cli = make_shared<ShardKvClient>();
  cli->commo_ = comm;
  verify(cli->commo_ != nullptr);
  static uint32_t id = 0;
  id++;
  cli->cli_id_ = id; 
  return cli;
}

} // namespace janus;
